content: keep cozy all year round with this beautiful hat which is infinitely adaptable to suit your every need the avoyelles beanie is a surprisingly quick knitting project with a fun texture make avoyelles beanie your own with color blocking stripes or holding multiple yarns together to create a marled effect or add a fluffy halo working each section of the hat in a different color yarn or pattern will create different looks when worn for effortless fun we love using self-striping yarns for avoyelles beanie
